```{r}
# caricamento librerie
library("dplyr")
library("ggplot2")
library("tidyverse")
```


```{r}
# caricamento dataset
df <- read.csv("asymptotic_times.csv")

df %>% 
  filter(time < 0.001001)

View(df)
```


```{r}
# geom_smooth di heapSelect
heapSelect <- 
  df %>% 
  filter(algorithm == "heapSelect")
  
View(heapSelect)

heapSelectPlot <-
  ggplot(data = heapSelect) +
  geom_smooth(mapping = aes(x = size, y = time), fill = "orange", color = "orange")

heapSelectPlot
```


```{r}
# geom_smooth di quickSelect
quickSelect <- 
  df %>% 
  filter(algorithm == "quickSelect")

View(quickSelect)

quickSelectPlot <-
  ggplot(data = quickSelect) +
  geom_smooth(mapping = aes(x = size, y = time), fill = "orange", color = "orange")

quickSelectPlot
```


```{r}
# Che varianza c'Ã¨ tra i tempi d'esecuzione per una stessa size

heapSelectTimeVariance <-
heapSelect %>% 
  group_by(size) %>% 
  summarize(timeVariance = format(var(time), scientific=FALSE)) %>% 
  drop_na(timeVariance)

quickSelectTimeVariance <-
quickSelect %>% 
  group_by(size) %>% 
  summarize(timeVariance = format(sd(time), scientific=FALSE)) %>% 
  drop_na()

heapSelectTimeVariance$timeVariance

mean(heapSelectTimeVariance$timeVariance) > mean(quickSelectTimeVariance$timeVariance)
```



```{r}
# geom_line di quickSelect, senza ripetizioni (prendendo la media)
avgQuickSelectTimes <-
quickSelect %>% 
  group_by(size) %>% 
  summarize(avg = mean(time))

avgQuickSelectTimes

meanQuickSelectPlot <-
  ggplot(data = avgQuickSelectTimes) +
  geom_line(mapping = aes(x = size, y = avg), color = "orange")

meanQuickSelectPlot
```
